member.name: T:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter
member.summary: This class converts a string into a cipher string, and vice versa. It uses 128/256 bit AES Algorithm in the Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode. Key is hashed by MD5 or SHA2-256. If the key is hashed by MD5, 128 bit AES is used. If the key is hashed by SHA2-256, 256 bit AES is used. Initialization vector is hashed by MD5. PKCS7Padding is used as a padding mode and the binary output is encoded by Base64. All strings are converted into UTF-8 before encryption or hash.

member.name: F:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter.DefaultKeyHashAlgorithm
member.summary: The default hash algorithm that is used to compute hash for the encryption key.

member.summary: Whether the key hash algorithm or the key or the IV is modified

member.summary: Creates a new StringEncrypter instance.
member.param: The hash algorithm that is used to compute hash for the encryption key.
The secret key string. Null or an empty string is not allowed.
The initialization vector string. If this value is NULL, IV filled with zeros is used.

member.name: P:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter.KeyHashAlgorithm
member.summary: The hash algorithm that is used to compute hash for the encryption key. MD5 and SHA2-256 are supported. This value determines the AES key size. If the hash outputs 128 bit value, 128 bit AES is used. if the hash outputs 256 bit value, 256 bit AES is used.

member.name: P:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter.KeySize
member.summary: The encryption key size in bits. This value depends on the key hash algorithm.

member.name: P:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter.Key
member.summary: The secret key string. The key string is converted into UTF-8 and hashed by the specified key hash algorithm. Null or an empty string is not allowed.

member.name: P:Nicenis.Security.Cryptography.StringEncrypter.IV
member.summary: The initialization vector string. The initialization vector string is converted into UTF-8 and hashed by MD5. If this value is NULL, IV filled with zeros is used.

member.name: T:Nicenis.Windows.HoverEventMode
member.summary: Describe how the hover event is raised.

member.name: F:Nicenis.Windows.HoverEventMode.Once
member.summary: The hover event is raised when the hover condition is met and it is not raised again if pointing device is still in the target element. To raise the hover event again, the pointing device must be left out and reenter the target element and the hover condition is met.

member.name: F:Nicenis.Windows.HoverEventMode.Normal
member.summary: The hover event is raised when the hover condition is met.

member.name: F:Nicenis.Windows.HoverEventMode.Repeat
member.summary: The hover event is raised when the hover condition is met and it is repeated until the hover condition is broken. The interval is HoverTime.

member.summary: Windows Vista and later. The image is normally 256x256 pixels.
